name: Hockey! / Soccer!
overview: HOCKEY! You captain a full team of ice men. Battle for the puck at the face-off. Make an off-the-wall slap shot! Fake out the goalie and score! Unique on-screen electronic sensors automate play action! You control the stick man and goalie-the rest of the team automatically follows the puck! Realistic skating action! Digital time keeping! Automatic scoreboard. Full sync-sound! Two players! SOCCER! Use your head (and feet) to score in this computerized version of one of the most popular games in the world. Soccer is a national sport in England, Brazil, Russia and a hundred other countries from Albania to Zambia! Soccer is now the fastest growing major college sport in the U.S. and here comes all the action right to your own TV! On-screen digital scoring. Automatic time keeping and computerized play action. Full sync-sound! Two players!
